item.title: üë®‚Äçüíª How To Build a Serverless Hugo Blog on AWS for $0.51 per month
item.description: This post is in draft mode and is not done yet! Below is an AWS architecture diagram I created using diagrams.net , the free version of draw.io. This diagram visualizes how my website runs for just $0.51 a month (exc;uding the $12/year domain name registration). While making this, I was a little fuzzy on how Route53 actually worked, so I included some additional detail on how it interfaces with an example ISP.
